# entityIdentifier(_:)

**Type Method**

Delete all transcript records referencing the given AppEntity instance

## Declaration

```swift
static func entityIdentifier(_ identifier: EntityIdentifier) -> IntentDonationMatchingPredicate
```

## Creating a predicate

- **donationIdentifier(_:)**: Delete the transcript record with the given donation identifier
- **intentType(_:entityIdentifier:)**: Delete all transcript records for the given AppIntent type, optionally only those referencing a given AppEntity instance identifier
